tool_description: Searches for genetic matches by comparing a DNA profile against a database of other profiles, identifying potential relatives.

query_profile_id.description: ID of the profile to search for matches

database_name.description: Name of the database to search against

minimum_shared_cm.description: Minimum shared DNA threshold in cM (1.0-100.0)

maximum_matches.description: Maximum number of matches to return (10-10000)

exclude_known_relatives.description: Exclude profiles marked as known relatives

error_messages: Profile not found: The specified query_profile_id does not exist.
Database unavailable: The specified database is not accessible.
Invalid shared CM threshold: minimum_shared_cm must be between 1.0 and 100.0.
Invalid maximum matches: maximum_matches must be between 10 and 10000.
Invalid relationship range: Use valid relationship categories.
Invalid quality threshold: match_quality_threshold must be between 0.5 and 1.0.
Invalid privacy level: Use one of [public, standard, restricted].
usage: Specify query_profile_id and database_name, then adjust minimum_shared_cm based on desired relationship distance. Set maximum_matches to control result size.

shared_dna_amounts.description: Shared DNA amounts for each match in cM
